# META-FOUNDRY: Security Policy

We follow a strict **Security-by-Default** model:

### ğŸ” Zero-Trust Repository Rules
- No secrets are allowed in Git.
- All commits must be signed (GPG/Sigstore).
- Protected main branch (no force push).
- All changes require review from @VictorKVS.
- detect-secrets scanning pre-commit.
- Mandatory CI security checks (Bandit, Trivy, Semgrep).

### ğŸ›¡ Secure AI/LLM Development Rules
- No private tokens in code or configs.
- LLM clients use external secret vaults.
- AutoDoc engine sanitizes generation.
- All autogenerated docs require manual review.
